episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch03:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] called out to Arven,
who was in town looking worried about
something.
Hmm... What should I do?

Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Sorry,
I was just thinking about something.
Actually... Could I ask you for some advice?

The thing is...when I meet people for the first time,
I can be rude and leave a bad impression.
I know it’s not great, and I think it’s time I fixed it.
I’ve decided, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

You’re gonna teach me how to become friends
with people!

I always see you talking and being friendly with
everyone, and I’ve felt jealous!
But feel free to say no if you don’t want—
Wait, did you say yes without thinking?!
Well, I guess that’s why everyone likes you.
All right, then. I’ll be counting on you!
So, how should I do this?

Hm? I should go around town and talk to
strangers? But how?
(Tell him to try battling them.)
Battle them? Like Nemona?

I guess it’s true Nemona’s been getting to know
people through Pokémon battles.

(Tell him to try finding hobbies they
have in common.)

I see! I can do what Penny did: find a topic we’re
both interested in!

Hang on a minute... Isn’t she worse with new
people than I am?

Anyway, thinking isn’t gonna get us anywhere!
I gotta get out there and just do it!
I’ll follow your advice and talk to loads of people!
Days later...
So far, Operation Fix Arven’s Faults is going great!

Thanks to your advice, I’ve started talking to
people without leaving a bad impression!
I appreciate it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
As a thank-you, I brought some handmade sweets!
I’ve loads, so have as many as you want!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Arven ate the
handmade sweets together!
Phew, I’m full.

We were so absorbed in eating and talking...
What a great time!

Because of something that happened in Paldea,
and now this...

I’ve gotten to feel the warmth of relying on one’s
pals—and having them rely on you.

This time, you helped me. But next time, it’s my
turn, you know?

If there’s anything you’re struggling with,
don’t keep it to yourself.
Talk to me first! I’ll help you out, no matter what!
So, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Will you always...be my bud?
(Promise him you’ll always be buds.)

Hehe, I thought so! And that’s a promise,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

(Laugh and tell him you’ll be counting
on him.)

Of course! Any problems we face, we’ll solve
together in a flash!
I feel better now...

Having a meal with someone’s always nice!
It makes food taste better, too!
Also, I feel like I can be more honest.
Especially when I’m with my bud!
